1.0.name: wordpress/wp-ebay-daily-deals
1.0.description:
Allows you to insert a listing of the eBay Daily Deals in your sidebar. If you include an eBay Partner Network campaign ID, you can earn money from traffic you drive to ebay!

A few of the features:

  • Choose how many deals to show
  • Only show a specific deal catagory if you like
  • Allows you to use the eBay Partner Network
  • Choose the logo width to fit your sidebar
  • Hides the affiliate link to ebay
